flavor_text: The user slugs the foe with a shattering punch. It can also smash cracked boulders.
effect: Teaches Rock Smash to a compatible Pokemon.

name: HM07
flavor_text: The user charges the foe at an awesome speed. It can also be used to climb a waterfall.
effect: Teaches Waterfall to a compatible Pokemon.

name: HM08
flavor_text: A charging attack that may also leave the foe confused. It can also be used to scale rocky walls.
effect: Teaches Rock Climb to a compatible Pokemon.

name: Explorer Kit
flavor_text: A bag filled with convenient tools for exploring. It provides access to the Underground.
effect: Sends the trainer to the Underground.  Only usable outside.

name: Loot Sack
flavor_text: A sturdy, spacious bag that is used to carry loot obtained in the coal mine.
effect: Unused.

name: Rule Book
flavor_text: It lists the rules for holding battles. For linked battles, you may choose which set of rules you wish to use.
effect: Unused.

name: Poke Radar
flavor_text: A tool that can search out Pokémon that are hiding in grass. Its battery is recharged as you walk.
effect: Designates several nearby patches of grass as containing Pokemon, some of which may be special radar-only Pokemon.  Successive uses in a certain way create chains of encounters with the same species; longer chains increase the chance that a shiny Pokemon of that species will appear.

name: Point Card
flavor_text: A card that lists the Battle Points you have earned.
effect: Tracks Battle Points.

name: Journal
flavor_text: A notebook that keeps a day-to-day record of your adventure so far.
effect: Records some of the trainer's activities for the day.

name: Seal Case
flavor_text: A case for storing Seals that can be applied to the capsule cases of Poké Balls.
effect: Contains Seals used for decorating Pokeballs.

name: Fashion Case
flavor_text: A fancy case for the tidy and organized storage of colorful Pokémon Accessories.
effect: Contains Pokemon Accessories.

name: Seal Bag
flavor_text: A tiny bag that can hold ten Seals for decorating Poké Balls.
effect: Unused.

name: Pal Pad
flavor_text: A convenient notepad that is used for registering your friends and keeping a record of game play.
effect: Contains friend codes for up to 32 other players, as well as their sprite, gender, and basic statistics for those that have been seen on WFC.

name: Works Key
flavor_text: A large key for operating the doors of the Valley Windworks in the canyon. It was held by a Team Galactic Grunt.
effect: Opens the front door of the Valley Windworks.  Reusable.

name: Old Charm
flavor_text: An ancient good-luck charm made of Pokémon bones to be taken to the elder of Celestic Town.
effect: Given to Cynthia's grandmother to get the Surf HM.

name: Galactic Key
flavor_text: A card key for disengaging security systems in the Galactic HQ. Losing it can result in punishment, apparently.
effect: Grants access to Galactic HQ in Veilstone City.

name: Red Chain
flavor_text: A mythical chain that is said to link the legendary Pokémon that created the Sinnoh region.
effect: Unused.

name: Town Map
flavor_text: A very convenient map that can be viewed anytime. It even shows your  present location.
effect: Displays a map of the region including the trainer's position, location names, visited towns, gym locations, and where the trainer has been walking recently.

name: Vs. Seeker
flavor_text: A device that indicates Trainers who want to battle. Its battery charges while you walk.
effect: Reveals trainers who want a rematch, by showing !! over their heads.  Each use drains the battery; requires 100 steps to charge.

name: Coin Case
flavor_text: A case for holding Coins obtained at the Game Corner. It holds up to 50,000 Coins.
effect: Contains the Coins used by the Game Corner, to a maximum of 50,000.

name: Old Rod
flavor_text: An old and beat-up fishing rod. Use it by any body of water to fish for wild aquatic Pokémon.
effect: Used to find Pokemon on the Old Rod list for an area, which are generally Magikarp or similar.

name: Good Rod
flavor_text: A new, good-quality fishing rod. Use it by any body of water to fish for wild aquatic Pokémon.
effect: Used to find Pokemon on the Good Rod list for an area, which are generally mediocre.

name: Super Rod
flavor_text: An awesome, high-tech fishing rod. Use it by any body of water to fish for wild aquatic Pokémon.
effect: Used to find Pokemon on the Super Rod list for an area, which are generally the best available there.

name: Sprayduck
flavor_text: A watering can shaped like a PSYDUCK. It helps promote healthy growth of Berries planted in soft soil.
effect: Waters Berry plants.

name: Poffin Case
flavor_text: A case for storing Poffin cooked from Berries.
effect: Contains up to 100 Poffins.

name: Bicycle
flavor_text: A folding Bicycle that enables much faster movement than the Running Shoes.
effect: Increases movement speed outside or in caves.  In high gear, allows the trainer to hop over some rocks and ascend muddy slopes.

name: Suite Key
flavor_text: A key to one of the suites at the luxury hotel by a lake. For some odd reason, it often disappears.
effect: Opens the locked building in the lakeside resort.

name: Oak's Letter
flavor_text: A letter from Prof. Oak. Written in it is a request for you to go to Rt. 224.
effect: Grants access to Flower Paradise and Shaymin.

name: Lunar Wing
flavor_text: A feather that glows like the moon. It is said to possess the power to dispel nightmares.
effect: Cures the sailor's son of his nightmares; no reward, only a side effect of seeing Cresselia.

name: Member Card
flavor_text: A card needed for entering the inn in Canalave City. Oddly, the last date marked on it was 50 years ago.
effect: Provides access to Newmoon Island and Darkrai.

name: Azure Flute
flavor_text: A flute that puts out echoing sounds that do not seem to be of this world. It is unknown who made it.
effect: Supposedly related to t

name: S.S. Ticket
flavor_text: The ticket required for sailing on the ferry S.S. Anne. It has a drawing of a ship on it.
effect: Unused.

name: Contest Pass
flavor_text: The pass required for entering Pokémon Contests. It has a drawing of an award ribbon on it.
effect: Allows the trainer to enter Contests.

name: Magma Stone
flavor_text: A stone formed when boulders melted in intensely hot magma, then hardened. Magma remains sealed inside.
effect: Unused.

name: Parcel
flavor_text: A parcel entrusted in your care. You are supposed to deliver it to your childhood friend who left Twinleaf Town.
effect: Given to the trainer's rival in Jubilife City.  Contains two Town Maps, one of which is given to the trainer upon delivery.

name: Coupon 1
flavor_text: A coupon to be exchanged for a Pokémon Watch (Pokétch for short). Three coupons are needed.
effect: One of three coupons needed to receive a Poketch.

name: Coupon 2
flavor_text: A coupon to be exchanged for a Pokémon Watch (Pokétch for short). Three coupons are needed.
effect: One of three coupons needed to receive a Poketch.

name: Coupon 3
flavor_text: A coupon to be exchanged for a Pokémon Watch (Pokétch for short). Three coupons are needed.
effect: One of three coupons needed to receive a Poketch.

name: Storage Key
flavor_text: The key to Team Galactic's sinister warehouse located at the edge of Veilstone City.
effect: Grants access to the Team Galactic warehouse in Veilstone City.

name: SecretPotion
flavor_text: A fantastic medicine dispensed by the pharmacy in Cianwood City. It fully heals a Pokémon of any ailment.
effect: Required to cure the Psyducks blocking Route 210 of their chronic headaches.
